sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello, Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛First name

Babysitter 1 - Update Record➛...➛First name 1 - Update Record➛...➛Last name has been assigned to your request Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Number starting at Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Start Date/Time for Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Duration (duration_int) hours.

The babysitter will contact you 4 hours before your scheduled service time. If you need to cancel or reschedule your service please update your request Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Number. 

Thank you very much for your business.

Have a nice day

 

BabySitter Group
Your babysitter request {{285e0db4-5b0d-4ab0-9c83-eca2faffbf4e.record.number}} has been assigned.
